---
pagetitle: "Presentación Tesis"
Author: René Canales
lang: es
knitr:
  opts_chunk:
    collapse: true
    comment: "#>"
    R.options:
      knitr.graphics.auto_pdf: true
format:
  revealjs:
    #logo: images/puc.png
    slide-number: true
    theme: "libs/tesis.scss"
    auto-stretch: false
    title-slide-attributes:
      visibility: false
    transition: fade
    transition-speed: slow
    # Ajustes para mejor separación y tamaño
    width: 1280
    height: 720
    margin: 0.1
    min-scale: 0.2
    max-scale: 2.0
    center: true
    # data-background-image: images/cover.jpg
    # data-background-size: cover
    auto-play-media: true
    mathjax: "default"
    # Configuración adicional para mejor presentación
    slide-level: 2
    incremental: false
  pdf:
    format: beamer 
    keep-tex: true
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
---
```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  error = FALSE, 
  message = FALSE,
  fig.width = 10,
  fig.height = 6,
  fig.align = "center",
  out.width = "90%",
  dpi = 300
) 

options(kableExtra.html.bsTable = TRUE)
options(knitr.kable.NA = "")
```
